Haste
Whenever Magma Spewer attacks, defending player may have Magma Spewer deal 2 damage to them. If they do, return Magma Spewer to its owner’s hand.
notes:

4/2 > 3/3
When Magma Spewer enters the battlefield, target opponent may have it gain haste. If they don’t, Magma Spewer deals 4 damage to them. > Haste
Whenever Magma Spewer attacks, defending player may have Magma Spewer deal 2 damage to him or her. If he or she does, return Magma Spewer to its owner’s hand.
